alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Southern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 2:35PM CST until January 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST MONDAY NIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 above zero. * WHERE...Beauregard, Allen, Northern Calcasieu and Southern Calcasieu Parishes. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from noon Monday to midnight CST Monday night. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 3 AM to 9 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call 511 for road information.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Southern Calcasieu
